column4: I am a fan of consistency in my desktop.  Is there any gtk option to allow the gtk save dialogs to open in "advanced mode" by default?

I believe that depends on which widget was used when the devs wrote the app. I recenly found a pygtk app that had the old open/save dialog, but it used a .glade file. I opened that file in glade designer, switches the old widget for the new one, saved it and the app now uses the new open/save dialog.
that is comforting, but not particularly helpful.
